title: Ultimate One Direction Quiz - Part 4
description: Think you're the ultimate Directioner? Test your knowledge with these 50 challenging questions about One Direction's lesser-known facts, behind-the-scenes details, and the members' solo careers!

questions.question: Which One Direction member auditioned for The X Factor with 'Hey There Delilah'?

questions.answer: Niall Horan did not release an EP, he went straight to full-length albums
